description: The small but symbolic fall is a "positive development" in the fight against the virus, officials say.
title: Coronavirus: Hope as Italy records first fall in active virus cases
title_page: Coronavirus: Hope as Italy records first fall in active virus cases - BBC News
maintext: Intensive care figures also show a downward trend, with occupancy now at its lowest level in a month. Italy is by no means out of the woods. But it is on the right path - and it now feels like its sacrifices are paying off.
